listitem.para: Configuration application is disabled because the named disable file is present (see ).
Remove the file to enable configuration application.
A lock could not be obtained for the lock file.
Verify that the lock file can be createdm, is writable and on a local file system. Increase the wait time for obtaining the lock (see ).

section.title: System Errors
section.para: System errors are fatal, no changes will be done to the system.

listitem.para: The lsb_release command could not be run.
Install or deploy the package containing the lsb_release command on all systems where config5 is run with the same settings.
The named perl module is not installed but either generally required or required because of an optional functionality that is enabled.
Install or deploy the named module on all systems where config5 is run with the same settings.

section.title: Setting Errors
section.para: Setting errors are fatal, no changes will be done to the system.

varlistentry.term: Cannot load module 'module' for keyword in …

listitem.para: The module of the handling class for the change failed to load.
The features directory could not be read.

varlistentry.term: Mandatory system information item 'item' could not be determined

listitem.para: The settings list the system information item as mandatory but the system information module did not set a value for it.

varlistentry.term: No handling class for keyword 'keyword' in …

listitem.para: The settings do not specify a class to handle changes with this keyword.
An undefined system information item was used in the class match list (see .)

section.title: Configuration Data Errors
section.para: Configuration data errors are fatal, no changes will be done to the system.

listitem.para: A change was correctly parsed but no class was declared.
The same file or directory is configured in different features.
The feature contains two declarations of the same class.

varlistentry.term: Feature 'feature' does not contain a '…' file

listitem.para: The feature does not contain a spec file.

varlistentry.term: 'file' is of the wrong type for …

listitem.para: An append change was used for a path that is not a plain file.
An append change for a file was found for which there is no matching touch or copy change in the same pass.
Unexpected arguments were found in a change.
The change requires more arguments.
The flag is invalid for the change.
The mode is invalid. See for a description of the mode parameter.
The SELinux context is invalid. See for a list of supported context formats.
The substitution is invalid.
The file could not be found in the filesystem of the target system or in the feature.
The path of the file or directory is not absolute.
Template Toolkit failed to process the content of the source file.

varlistentry.term: Recursive reference to class 'class' in class 'parent'

listitem.para: A class declaration references an undefined class.

varlistentry.term: Reference to undefined class 'class' in class 'class' in feature 'feature'

listitem.para: A class declaration references an undefined class.

varlistentry.term: Unable to append data in 'source' to 'file'

listitem.para: The data from the source file could not be read. Verify that the source file exists and is readable.
The change with this keyword is unknown.
The group is unknown or invalue. See for a description of the group parameter.
The user is unknown or invalid. See for a description of the user parameter.

varlistentry.term: Unparsable line number in '…' file for feature 'feature': …

listitem.para: The line is not a valid class declaration or change.

section.title: Configuration Application Errors
section.para: The following errors are reported for changes as they are applied but do not interrupt the application of other changes.

listitem.para: The command returned a non-zero return value. Increase the verbosity level to see the output and error messages of the command.

varlistentry.term: Failed to correctly apply change in …

listitem.para: The change could not be correctly applied.

varlistentry.term: Unable to chcon 'path' to context in …

listitem.para: The SELinux context of the file or directory could not be set. Verify that the given path is on a file system that has SELinux support.

varlistentry.term: Unable to chmod 'file' to mode mode in …

listitem.para: The mode bits of the file or directory could not be set.

varlistentry.term: Unable to chown 'path' to uid:gid in …

listitem.para: The user and group of the file or directory could not be set.
The directory could not be created. Verify that the directory containing the file exists and that it is in a local, writable file system.

varlistentry.term: Unable to create link 'link' to 'source' in …

listitem.para: The link to the source path could not be created. Verify that the source file exists and is in the same file system as the link. Verify that the directory containing the link exists and that it is in a local, writable file system.

varlistentry.term: Unable to create symbolic link 'link' in …

listitem.para: The symbolic link could not be created. Verify that the directory containing the symbolic link exists and that it is in a local, writable file system.

varlistentry.term: Unable to get properties of 'file' in …

listitem.para: The properties of an existing file could not be read.

varlistentry.term: Unable to open 'file' for writing in …

listitem.para: The file could not be opened for writing. Verify that the directory containing the file exists and that it is in a local, writable file system.
The file or directory could not be removed Verify that the file or directory is in a local, writable file system. When a directory is removed it must be empty.

varlistentry.term: Unable to rename temporary to 'file' in …

listitem.para: The temporary file could not be renamed to the file.
An error occured while writing data to the file. Verify that the file system containing the file has enough free space.
